duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network construction projects.
Manage multiple construction projects, ensuring completion within agreed-upon timelines and budget constraints.
Participate in vendor selection and bid processes.
Develop and maintain customer relationships to influence award of service work to the company.
Manage equipment and material procurement for construction projects.
Ensure compliance with construction policies, procedures, and regulations.
Provide direction to general contractors aligned with job specifications.
Review As Built drawings to validate quantities and maintain accuracy in project tracking systems.
Be available as an escalation point to engage General Contractors on corrective actions post internal closeout review.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers working with various teams and customers.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required.
